participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Sociable and easy-going, enjoys interacting with others and has a passion for cars.
participant_1.background: i go to the gym most days just to socialize. i've never had a steady relationship. i work from home. i like to spend my money on cars.

participant_2.name: Jamie
participant_2.personality: Caring and creative, loves animals and has a knack for building and design.
participant_2.background: i have 5 cats. my cats are very special to me. i enjoy building houses. i am a construction worker.
